description:
Designed to accommodate larger mountaineering and snowboard boots, the Range-BC’s PackFlat™ Binding features a field-replaceable urethane Z-strap that holds the foot securely. Adding to the grip provided by the traction rails is the lightweight, low-profile BC Crampon that bites into hard snow. Rounding out the design are 19° heel lifts that reduce calf and tendon strain on those steep ascents.

  • Reactiv-Trac™ Frame with Nytex Infinity Decking provides a lightweight platform for stability and flotation
  • Pack-Flat™ binding allows the snowshoes to nest together for easy and efficient packability
  • Pivot Limiter allows a more comfortable steadily stride
  • Low-profile tempered steel BC crampons bite into variable snow
  • Traction rails provide sidehill stability
  • Heel lifts for comfort and efficiency when going uphill
name: Atlas Range BC Snowshoes - Unisex
